# VEHICLE::SET_SHOULD_LERP_FROM_AI_TO_FULL_RECORDING

## Summary
Flags this car to interpolate from the current position in an AI recording when switching to a full recording to avoid pops in heading/position

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** interpolate

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
A vehicle recording playback flag only used in jewelry_heist
